attributes.action: Ban Applied Behavioural Analysis for autistic people
attributes.background: The Government should ban Applied Behavioural Analysis (sometimes referred to as “conversion therapy” for autistic people), and accept that being autistic is ok and autistic children shouldn’t be subject to “therapy” like this. Many autistic adults can attest to the horrors of ABA.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
